meanings.sent1: The mutilators were caught red-handed by the police.
meanings.sent2: The community was shocked to discover the presence of mutilators in their neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The mutilators tried to convince everyone that their actions were for a good cause.
meanings.sent4: The mutilators' deeds left a permanent scar on the town's history.
meanings.sent5: The authorities were determined to put an end to the reign of the mutilators.

meanings.definition: Those who cause disfigurement or injury by removing or destroying a part of the body.
meanings.sent1: The mutilators' victims sought justice for the harm inflicted upon them.
meanings.sent2: Hospitals often see the aftermath of the work done by mutilators.
meanings.sent3: The mutilators' actions were so extreme that they seemed like characters from a horror movie.
meanings.sent4: The mutilators' impact on society was like a dark cloud hanging over everyone.
meanings.sent5: The community lived in fear of encountering the mutilators in the shadows.
